languages.text: {n}Клеменциа вздрагивает и неуверенно кивает.{/n} "Вы... правы, Леди-Навигатор. Думаю, губернатор нащупывает границы дозволенного. Дерзко с его стороны, но Ее Светлость любила дерзких".

{n}Clementia flinches and nods uncertainly.{/n} "Of course... You are right, Lady Navigator. I believe that the governor is testing the limits of what is allowed. An audacious move on his part, but Her Ladyship always favoured audacity."
languages.original_text: {n}Клеменциа вздрагивает и неуверенно кивает.{/n} "Вы... правы, Леди-Навигатор. Думаю, губернатор нащупывает границы дозволенного. Дерзко с его стороны, но Ее Светлость любила дерзких".

traits.locale_text: {n}Clementia flinches and nods uncertainly.{/n} "Of course... You are right, Lady Navigator. I believe that the governor is testing the limits of what is allowed. An audacious move on his part, but Her Ladyship always favoured audacity."

{n}Clementia flinches and averts her gaze in embarrassment.{/n} "Of course... You are right, Lady Navigator. I believe that the governor is testing the limits of what is allowed. An audacious move on his part, but Her Ladyship always favoured audacity."

{n}Clementia flinches and nods uncertainly.{/n} "Of course... You are right, Lady Navigator. I believe that the governor is testing the limits of what is allowed. An audacious move on his part, but Her Ladyship always favoured audacity."

{n}Clementia flinches and nods uncertainly.{/n} "Of course... You are right, Lady Navigator. I believe that the governor is testing the limits of what is allowed. An audacious move on his part, but Her Ladyship always favoured audacity."

{n}Clementia flinches and nods uncertainly.{/n} "Of course... You are right, Lady Navigator. I believe that the governor is testing the limits of what is allowed. An audacious move on his part, but Her Ladyship always favoured audacity."

{n}Clementia flinches and nods uncertainly.{/n} "Of course... You are right, Lady Navigator. I believe that the governor is testing the limits of what is allowed. An audacious move on his part, but Her Ladyship always favoured audacity."

languages.text: {n}Clémentia tressaille et acquiesce d'un air hésitant.{/n} « Bien sûr... Vous avez raison, dame navigatrice. Je crois que le gouverneur éprouve les limites de l'interdit. C'est fort audacieux de sa part... et Sa Seigneurie a toujours apprécié l'audace. »
languages.original_text: {n}Clementia flinches and nods uncertainly.{/n} "Of course... You are right, Lady Navigator. I believe that the governor is testing the limits of what is allowed. An audacious move on his part, but Her Ladyship always favoured audacity."

traits.locale_text: {n}Clémentia tressaille et acquiesce d'un air hésitant.{/n} « Bien sûr... Vous avez raison, dame navigatrice. Je crois que le gouverneur éprouve les limites de l'interdit. C'est fort audacieux de sa part... et Sa Seigneurie a toujours apprécié l'audace. »

languages.text: {n}克莱门缇雅退缩着，不确定地点了点头。{/n}“当然……您说得对，导航者女士。我相信总督这么做，是在考验您究竟能容忍到什么程度。这确实是很大胆的行为，不过西奥多拉夫人一向对大胆之人青睐有加。”
languages.original_text: {n}Clementia flinches and nods uncertainly.{/n} "Of course... You are right, Lady Navigator. I believe that the governor is testing the limits of what is allowed. An audacious move on his part, but Her Ladyship always favoured audacity."

traits.locale_text: {n}克莱门缇雅退缩着，不确定地点了点头。{/n}“当然……您说得对，导航者女士。我相信总督这么做，是在考验您究竟能容忍到什么程度。这确实是很大胆的行为，不过西奥多拉夫人一向对大胆之人青睐有加。”

languages.text: {n}Clementia zuckt zusammen und nickt unsicher.{/n} "Natürlich ... Ihr habt recht, Lady Navigator. Ich glaube, dass der Gouverneur die Grenzen des Erlaubten auslotet. Verwegen, doch ihre Ladyschaft hat Verwegenheit immer geschätzt."
languages.original_text: {n}Clementia flinches and nods uncertainly.{/n} "Of course... You are right, Lady Navigator. I believe that the governor is testing the limits of what is allowed. An audacious move on his part, but Her Ladyship always favoured audacity."

traits.locale_text: {n}Clementia zuckt zusammen und nickt unsicher.{/n} "Natürlich ... Ihr habt recht, Lady Navigator. Ich glaube, dass der Gouverneur die Grenzen des Erlaubten auslotet. Verwegen, doch ihre Ladyschaft hat Verwegenheit immer geschätzt."

languages.text: {n}Clementia se estremece y asiente con incertidumbre.{/n} «Por supuesto... Tiene razón, Lady Navegante. Tengo la impresión de que el gobernador está probando hasta dónde puede llegar sin violar las restricciones. Algo atrevido por su parte, pero a la señora siempre le ha gustado la osadía».
languages.original_text: {n}Clementia flinches and nods uncertainly.{/n} "Of course... You are right, Lady Navigator. I believe that the governor is testing the limits of what is allowed. An audacious move on his part, but Her Ladyship always favoured audacity."

traits.locale_text: {n}Clementia se estremece y asiente con incertidumbre.{/n} «Por supuesto... Tiene razón, Lady Navegante. Tengo la impresión de que el gobernador está probando hasta dónde puede llegar sin violar las restricciones. Algo atrevido por su parte, pero a la señora siempre le ha gustado la osadía».

languages.text: {n}クレメンティアはたじろぎ、ためらいがちに頷く。{/n}「もちろん…あなたの言う通りです、航宙士殿。総督は許容範囲を確かめようとしているのでしょう。あちらは大胆な行動を見せましたが、かの陛下はいつだって大胆なことをお好みでした」
languages.original_text: {n}Clementia flinches and nods uncertainly.{/n} "Of course... You are right, Lady Navigator. I believe that the governor is testing the limits of what is allowed. An audacious move on his part, but Her Ladyship always favoured audacity."

traits.locale_text: {n}クレメンティアはたじろぎ、ためらいがちに頷く。{/n}「もちろん…あなたの言う通りです、航宙士殿。総督は許容範囲を確かめようとしているのでしょう。あちらは大胆な行動を見せましたが、かの陛下はいつだって大胆なことをお好みでした」

languages.text: {n}Clementia irkilip tereddütle başını eğiyor.{/n} "Elbette haklısınız Leydi Rotacı. Valinin neye müsaade gösterileceğinin sınırlarını test ettiğine inanıyorum. Cüretkâr bir hareket ancak Leydi Hazretleri, cüretkârlıktan her daim hoşlanmıştır."
languages.original_text: {n}Clementia flinches and nods uncertainly.{/n} "Of course... You are right, Lady Navigator. I believe that the governor is testing the limits of what is allowed. An audacious move on his part, but Her Ladyship always favoured audacity."

traits.locale_text: {n}Clementia irkiliyor ve tereddütle başını eğiyor.{/n} "Elbette haklısınız Leydi Rotacı. Valinin neye müsaade gösterileceğinin sınırlarını test ettiğine inanıyorum. Cüretkâr bir hareket ancak Leydi Hazretleri cüretkârlıktan her zaman hoşlanmıştır."
